title: The Furnace of Broken Dreams
detail: From before dawn, until after dusk, thousands of families labour in the brick factories of Dhaka, Bangladesh. With no rights and very little pay, life is harsh — marked only by the relentless pace of bricks being loaded onto their heads or into the carts.

title: Timeless City
detail: Located between East and West, the magnificent and at times melancholic city of Istanbul has been carrying the wisdom of many cultures for centuries. For eight years I have been documenting the story of this timeless city and paying tribute to its inhabitants.
